strings:
<se_low>Kalderasha: Ah, so you have come.
Now stand before the crystal ball and concentrate on what it is that troubles you.

<se_low>Kalderasha: Yes! Yeees!
The mists are clearing.
I see...a castle!

<se_low>Kalderasha: I see a castle...and a young King.
He is smiling happily.
The thing you seek is with him.

<se_low>Kalderasha: That is all I can tell you.
The rest you must figure out for yourself.
